title: Whale of a Tale
description: Ariel adopts a baby whale, much to the dismay of her father, King Triton.

title: The Great Sebastian
description: Sebastion becomes a peace ambassador and tries to make peace with the power hungry Sharkanians, with Ariel following him to their land.

title: Ariel's Treasures
description: When an eggbeater falls into Ariel's hands, Ursela puts an evil spell on it to terrorize the citizens of Atlantica.
